com.sorcix.sirc

Interface ModeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IrcAdaptor

    public interface ModeListener
    Notified of user mode changes.
    Author:
    Sorcix
    See Also:
    IrcConnection.addModeListener(ModeListener), IrcConnection.removeModeListener(ModeListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdmin(IrcConnection irc, Channel channel, User sender, User user)

    • Method Detail

      • onAdmin

        void onAdmin(IrcConnection irc,
           Channel channel,
           User sender,
           User user)
        Someone was given Admin mode.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        channel - The channel in which the user mode was changed.
        sender - The user changing this mode.
        user - The user whose mode was changed.
